product_name: Marmot Garwood Fleece Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: When a chilly day has you reaching for an extra layer, look to the Marmot Garwood Fleece Shirt to keep you warm. Lightweight polyester fleece brings just the right amount of warmth to your active adventures; soft, textured fleece dries quickly to minimize heat loss. Zippered pocket on the left sleeve. The Marmot Garwood Fleece Shirt has a regular fit. Closeout.
short_description: When a chilly day has you reaching for an extra layer, look to the Marmot Garwood Fleece Shirt to keep you warm.
